attributes.action: Get Dave Benson Phillips back on TV!
attributes.additional_details: Dave Benson Phillips, the bright eyed TV presenter with a big smile. Where has he been? Why is he no longer gracing my television with his presence? I suggest that BBC one has at least 8 hours a week of Dave Benson Phillips on our screens. After all, I don't pay my licence fee to watch rubbish like 'The One Show' or 'Eastenders'.
